content.rendered:
We regularly perform industry standard as well as general surveys of vessels for oil and gas companies, vessel’s owners, offshore installation contractors, investors etc. covering the following scopes:

  • Vessel OCIMF OVID & IMCA CMID Audit
  • Hull / Machinery Condition and / or Valuation Survey of Specialised Offshore Vessels, MODU, and Offshore Equipment on behalf of the Hull Underwriters/ Potential Buyers/ Charterers
  • On/Off Hire Survey (Consumable and / or Condition)
  • Bunker Transfer Survey
  • Vessel Mooring and Lay-Up Survey
  • Witnessing and Verification of Marine Equipment Testing
  • Other Surveys

jetpack-related-posts.title: Marine Consultancy
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar provide professional offshore & marine consultancy services. Our team of Master Mariners and Naval Architects has extensive experience of a wide range of activities from simple marine operations to challenging and complex offshore projects.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Marine Warranty Services
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The AqualisBraemar teams of Marine Warranty Surveyors, Engineers and Master Mariners act to protect Underwriters’ interests or self-insured Clients. We provide independent third party review and approval of offshore projects.

jetpack-related-posts.title: David Duffy | General Manager, Abu Dhabi
DP FMEA & Audit - Dynamic Positioning
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We provide an experienced multidisciplinary team of engineering and operational resources to support the DP industry. Aqualis delivers dynamic positioning services including DP FMEA, DP audit, DP Assurance and DP project management.
